Posts.EditableText: I've been trying to use the variables of HP to run it so whenever (after attacking someone) that person loses all their HP, they're taken to... a hospital, or someplace like that. However, I don't know how!
Posts.HTML: I've been trying to use the variables of HP to run it so whenever (after attacking someone) that person loses all their HP, they're taken to... a hospital, or someplace like that. However, I don't know how!

Posts.EditableText:
Each time the player is attacked you can use a condition to check if the player has equal to, or below 0 hp.  Something like the following should be added to your attack procedure (If you have one that is).

[code:1owqbvzn]if ( %hp% <= 0 ) then goto <Hospital> else ' do damage procedure[/code:1owqbvzn]

Oh, also make sure you use the correct variable format, otherwise it won't work properly.  Something like, [b:1owqbvzn]%hp[id]%[/b:1owqbvzn] or some crap like that.
